name: Shattered Halo
description:
In a realm inbetween worlds ( inbetween earth, haven and hell) a warrior is sent on a mission by the havens.

After a great war between angels, demons and all manner of creatures. The  archangel Stephie's halo was shattered into multiple pieces. Now the demons are using those pieces (as they possess great power) to cause trouble in all realms. You are summoned to the world between worlds so you can fight these demons and find all the halo's pieces.

log 01
